review: There are many apps, but Watchup, which is what I would like to take advantage of, asks to start a new account.  I did, I put in my email address and  password, and the system accepted it.  When I went back in to sign in, the system repeatedly says my credentials are incorrect.  I did it at least seven times, and just gave up.  Who do you talk to about the problems you may have with some of the apps?

review: Installed very easily. Works like a gem.  It only gets seconds to get going with a movie or tv show.  After I watch I always take a few minutes to look at the shows recommended for amazon prime, and select some for my watch list.  When I bought this, I thought I might need a supplemental service to have enough movies available.  This has not been the case.  So far we have excellent movies to watch, for free, from amazon prime. We both are very pleased with fire tv.  The voice search is quick and works for things all ready in the system.  If a movie is not available, voice search does not recognize it.  No problem.
